welcome_message_body: Welcome to Birigui, Brazil! Known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: Bar Bandeirante

restaurants.address: R. João Galo, (R. Nove de Julho), Birigüi, SP
